title: Quercetin improves the protection of hydroxysafflor yellow a against cerebral ischemic injury by modulating of blood-brain barrier and src-p-gp-mmp-9 signalling
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Xiang Li, Yuanxiao Yang, Pinpin Feng, Hongwei Wang, Mingzhi Zheng, Yiliang Zhu, Kai Zhong, Jue Hu, Yilu Ye, Linhuizi Lu, Qinqin Zhao
